00642 class command_line_parameters_parser : boost::noncopyable {
00643     typedef detail::common_checker< parameters, detail::parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00644     typedef boost::ptr_vector< checker >    common_checkers;
00645     typedef common_checkers::iterator       checker_it;
00646     typedef common_checkers::const_iterator checker_const_it;
00647 public:
00648     command_line_parameters_parser() : 
00649             name_value_separator( "=" ) {} 
00650 public:
00651     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& short_name
00652                              , const std::string& full_name
00653                              , void ( *fn )() ) {
00654         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00655     }

00668         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00669     }

00672                               , void ( *fn )() ) {
00673         return create_parameter( single_name, "", fn );

00693         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, obj, fn );

00799     template
00800     < 
00801         typename ObjectType
00802         , typename ArgType
00803     > 
00804     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& single_name
00805                              , ObjectType* obj
00806                              , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( ArgType ) const ) {  
00807         return create_parameter( single_name, "", obj, fn );
00808     }
00809 private:
00810     parameters registered_parameters;
00811 private:
00812     template< typename PtrToFun >
00813     parameter& create_parameter( const std::string&  short_name
00814                                 , const std::string& full_name
00815                                 , const PtrToFun&    ptr_to_fun ) { 
00816         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_fun, short_name );
00817         check_names_validity( short_name, full_name );
00818 
00819         registered_parameters += parameter( short_name, full_name, ptr_to_fun );
00820         return registered_parameters.back();
00821     }
00822 
00823     template
00824     < 
00825         typename PtrToObj
00826         , typename PtrToObjFun
00827     >
00828     parameter& create_parameter( const std::string&  short_name
00829                                 , const std::string& full_name
00830                                 , const PtrToObj&    ptr_to_obj
00831                                 , const PtrToObjFun& ptr_to_fun ) {
00832         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_obj, short_name );
00833         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_fun, short_name );
00834         check_names_validity( short_name, full_name );
00835         
00836         registered_parameters += parameter( short_name, full_name, ptr_to_obj, ptr_to_fun );
00837         return registered_parameters.back();
00838     }
00839 private:
00840     template< typename Ptr >
00841     void check_null_ptr( const Ptr& ptr, const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00842         if ( 0 == ptr ) {
00843             const std::string what_happened =
00844                 "Zero pointer (function/object/method) detected for parameter '" + parameter_name + "'!";
00845             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00846         } else {}
00847     }
00848 
00849     void check_names_validity( const std::string& short_name, const std::string& full_name ) const {
00850         check_spaces_existence_in( short_name );
00851         check_spaces_existence_in( full_name );
00852         check_equality_of( short_name, full_name );
00853         check_uniqueness_of( short_name );
00854         check_uniqueness_of( full_name );
00855     }
00856 
00857     void check_spaces_existence_in( const std::string& name ) const {
00858         if ( boost::contains( name, " " ) ) {
00859             const std::string what_happened = 
00860                     "Invalid parameter's name '" + name + "', it shouldn't contains space(s)!";
00861             throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00862         } else {}
00863     }
00864 
00865     void check_equality_of( const std::string& short_name, const std::string& full_name ) const {
00866         if ( short_name == full_name ) {
00867             const std::string what_happened = "Equal names of parameter: '"
00868                                               + short_name + "', '" + full_name + "'!";
00869             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00870         } else {}
00871     }
00872     
00873     void check_uniqueness_of( const std::string& name ) const {
00874         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00875                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00876                                            , name );
00877         if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00878             const std::string what_happened = "Parameter with name '" + name + "' already exists!";
00879             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00880         } else {}
00881     } 
00882 private:
00883     std::string name_value_separator;
00884     common_checkers checkers;
00885     detail::parameter_parts_extractor_p extractor;
00886 public:
00887     void set_value_separator( char separator ) {
00888         check_printable_of( separator );
00889         name_value_separator = separator;
00890     }
00891 private:
00892     void check_printable_of( char separator ) const {
00893         const int ascii_code = separator;
00894         if ( ascii_code <= 0x20 ) {
00895             const std::string what_happened = "Symbol (ASCII-code is "
00896                                               + detail::to_str( separator )
00897                                               + ") is not suitable for name-value separator!";
00898             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00899         } else {}
00900     }
00901 public:
00902     void parse( int argc, char** argv ) {
00903         detail::str_storage inputed_parameters = obtain_parameters_from( argc, argv );
00904         if ( there_is_nothing_to_parse( inputed_parameters ) ) {
00905             return;
00906         } else {}
00907         
00908         create_parameter_parts_extractor();
00909         create_parameters_checkers();
00910         base_checks( inputed_parameters );
00911         handle_unnamed_parameters( inputed_parameters );
00912         remaining_checks( inputed_parameters );
00913         call_corresponding_user_functions( inputed_parameters );
00914     }
00915 private:
00916     detail::str_storage obtain_parameters_from( int argc, char** argv ) const {
00917         detail::str_storage inputed_parameters;
00918         for ( int i = 1; i < argc; ++i ) {
00919             inputed_parameters += argv[i];
00920         }
00921         return inputed_parameters;
00922     }
00923     
00924     bool there_is_nothing_to_parse( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00925         return inputed_parameters.empty() 
00926                && no_parameters_with_default_value()
00927                && no_necessary_parameters();
00928     }
00929 
00930     bool no_parameters_with_default_value() const {
00931         parameter_const_it it = std::find_if( registered_parameters.begin()
00932                                               , registered_parameters.end()
00933                                               , boost::mem_fn( &parameter::has_default_value ) );
00934         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00935     }
00936 
00937     bool no_necessary_parameters() const {
00938         parameter_const_it it = std::find_if( registered_parameters.begin()
00939                                               , registered_parameters.end()
00940                                               , boost::mem_fn( &parameter::it_is_necessary ) );
00941         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00942     }
00943     
00944     void handle_unnamed_parameters( detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00945         detail::unnamed_parameters_handler handle( registered_parameters
00946                                                    , *extractor
00947                                                    , name_value_separator );
00948         handle( inputed_parameters );
00949     }
00950 
00951     void create_parameter_parts_extractor() {
00952         extractor.reset( new detail::parameter_parts_extractor( name_value_separator ) );
00953     } 
00954 
00955     void create_parameters_checkers() {
00956         using namespace detail;
00957 
00958         checkers.push_back( 
00959                 new parameters_existence_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00960         checkers.push_back( 
00961                 new parameters_redundancy_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) ); 
00962         checkers.push_back( 
00963                 new parameters_repetition_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00964         checkers.push_back( 
00965                 new incorrect_parameters_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) ); 
00966         checkers.push_back( 
00967                 new necessary_parameters_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00968         checkers.push_back( 
00969                 new parameters_values_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00970         checkers.push_back( 
00971                 new values_semantic_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00972     }
00973     
00974     void base_checks( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00975         const size_t base_checkers_quantity = 3;
00976         for ( checker_const_it it = checkers.begin();
00977               checkers.begin() + base_checkers_quantity != it;
00978               ++it ) {
00979             it->check( inputed_parameters );
00980         }
00981         checkers.erase( checkers.begin(), checkers.begin() + base_checkers_quantity );
00982     }
00983     
00984     void remaining_checks( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00985         for ( checker_const_it it = checkers.begin(); checkers.end() != it; ++it ) {
00986             it->check( inputed_parameters );
00987         }
00988     }
00989 
00990     void call_corresponding_user_functions( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00991         detail::user_functions_caller caller( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator );
00992         caller.call( inputed_parameters );
00993     }
00994 };
00995 
00997 typedef command_line_parameters_parser command_line_parameter_parser;
00998 
00999 } // namespace clpp
01000 
01002 namespace clp_parser = clpp;
